item.title: Very easy help needed
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

In the beginning of case 155: should be called…
int ZZZZZ = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType;
Look for that, but not the ZZZZZ, whatever is in the ZZZZZ, replace the NPCID with that

@delta wrote:

Search for
case 155:
In that add this:

addItem(1050, 1);

item.title: Very easy help needed
item.dc:creator: @Eportal Eportal
item.description:
@Eportal wrote:

Yeah… Im making an event,but i never did this before. I spawned a santa claus and all, but i need it that when you click on him, it gives you a santa hat. I know it will be something like

if (WHATEVER THE HELL) { addItem(SANTA HAT ID); }

Also, it would be cool if someone could tell me how I can force someone to only get 1 santa… Even answering 1 of them is cool.

Thanks!!!

Read full topic
